COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e
STRING: [Fal] “I think that's about it for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4
STRING: We finished up our rehearsal like we always did, and
began to pack up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0
STRING: The things we discussed yesterday were not in vain, we
had both benefited from it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6
STRING: Despite the fact that I hadn't written a proper response
to Arie's letter, just the fact that I felt more at ease was
a big thing for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc
STRING: It was not as if anything had really changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8
STRING: But Fal, who was in front of me this very moment, now
knew the problems I faced, and this gave me a certain
sense of comfort.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208
STRING: And in the same sense, I knew of the things that she
faced, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, have a good day at work.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x246
STRING: [Fal] “Are you going to drop by for dinner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, probably not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272
STRING: If I wanted to eat Fal's cooking, I didn't need to go to
Copert to do so, and either way I had spent a long time
with her anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4
STRING: [Fal] “Okay. Well, I'll see you tomorrow, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x304
STRING: Even if it was short, I always felt emotionally tired and
heavy after a good rehearsal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a
STRING: Just when I was thinking of going to the cafeteria to get
something to drink before heading home, I ran into
Torta as she came out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, Chris... Are you heading to the cafeteria?
Didn't you have lunch in your practice room?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I already ate. I just thought I'd grab
something to drink.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a6
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, by yourself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bc
STRING: [Chris] “That was the plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ee
STRING: [Torta] “Well, do you mind if I join you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x404
STRING: [Chris] “No, be my guest.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x436
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's go, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44c
STRING: [Chris] “...Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x462
STRING: Torta seemed unusually serious, so it was easy to
imagine what she was going to talk about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x478
STRING: Arie would have written to Torta as well, so it would
depend on just what Arie had written, but I had no
doubt that she was going to ask me about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e6
STRING: [Torta] “...So, what are you going to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fc
STRING: Her tone wasn't at all intense, and she didn't seem to
have any intention of criticizing me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x512
STRING: She said it simply, almost tactfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x528
STRING: This conversation began just as we were about to sit
down, after placing our drinks on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53e
STRING: [Chris] “I need to ask just to be sure, but how much do
you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570
STRING: [Torta] “...I know that she wrote to you, saying she
wanted to break up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x586
STRING: [Chris] “I see. That means you know everything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59c
STRING: Now, just how was I supposed to answer this?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a8
STRING: I hadn't made any decisions about what to do about
Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b4
STRING: However, I had already made a decision when it came
to Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5dc
STRING: [Torta] “You're not going to change your mind about
performing with Falsita, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fc
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62e
STRING: [Torta] “I see. In that case, you and Arie...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x644
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't decided anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x676
STRING: [Torta] “That basically means you have.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68c
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't written my response to Arie yet. But, I
think that has nothing to do with Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c8
STRING: [Torta] “I think it does.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6de
STRING: [Chris] “It doesn't to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x710
STRING: [Torta] “But it does to Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x726
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x758
STRING: [Torta] “I don't know the exact details of what Arie
wrote to you. But, I'm the one who told Arie about you,
so I want to know what's going on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79a
STRING: Is that a problem?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a6
STRING: [Chris] “Of course it's not a problem. I'll tell you
whatever I can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e2
STRING: [Torta] “In that case let's start with the thing I want to
know the most.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f8
STRING: Torta put on a smile as she asked, almost as if she was
going to laugh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x820
STRING: [Torta] “Do you like Falsita? I'm not asking if you're
dating her or anything, I just purely want to know how
you feel about her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: [Chris] “That's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87c
STRING: [Torta] “I practically know the answer, even if you don't
say it. But I want to hear it directly from you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going to put this out there first, but Fal and I
aren't a couple or anything like that. But, she is my
partner, and if you want to simply know if I like her or
not...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c6
STRING: [Chris] “Then the answer is, I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8dc
STRING: I knew that there was no point in hiding it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e8
STRING: It was ridiculous to say otherwise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f4
STRING: I knew about her past, and I knew what she was striving
for.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90a
STRING: And, I honestly felt that I wanted to help her in that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x932
STRING: [Torta] “...Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x948
STRING: [Chris] “I want to do what I can to help her. If I can, that
is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x984
STRING: [Torta] “In that case there's nothing more for me to say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99a
STRING: [Chris] “...So, what did Arie say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b8
STRING: [Torta] “She told me to be forgiving of you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ce
STRING: Saying only this, Torta got up out of her seat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f6
STRING: [Torta] “Make sure to do your best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0c
STRING: [Chris] “I feel like everyone is telling me that, these days.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3e
STRING: [Torta] “And your answer?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa54
STRING: [Chris] “Of course I'll do my best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa86
STRING: [Torta] “Good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa8
STRING: She sounded almost like Phorni, trying to speak as if she
was above me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabe
STRING: But then I remembered that it was actually the other
way around in reality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: Since we were children, Arie was introverted and quiet,
and it was Torta who always took a mature tone and
scolded Arie and me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaea
STRING: Thinking about this, I realized that Torta and Phorni may
have been a little similar.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb24
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, by the way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3a
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Ah, what is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6c
STRING: [Torta] “Where was that trattoria that she works at?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb82
STRING: [Chris] “Planning on going there?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: [Torta] “...Maybe. I was just thinking I'd like to go
sometime. I was wondering what kind of food she
cooks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd4
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc06
STRING: [Torta] “Ah, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc34
STRING: Perhaps she doesn't actually do any cooking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc40
STRING: [Chris] “Well, she said something about her running the
kitchen, so she might.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc68
STRING: [Torta] “Oh I see. In that case...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7e
STRING: [Chris] “Why don't you go there? I could join you, if you
like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: [Torta] “...Yeah, that might be a nice idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: [Chris] “She said she was working until six o'clock, so
shall we go there before then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, sure. I'll keep practicing until then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Chris] “In that case I'll just wait at home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd40
STRING: [Torta] “You don't need to practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd56
STRING: [Chris] “I already have. Do you mind if we meet in front
of my place at around half past five?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd92
STRING: [Torta] “No problem. Is the trattoria close by?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda8
STRING: [Chris] “It's about a five minute walk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc6
STRING: [Torta] “Okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf4
STRING: But, I don't want to get wet, so can we just meet at
your apartment?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: [Chris] “Of course, that makes it even easier for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3c
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe52
STRING: Saying this, Torta left with the usual smile on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea2
STRING: I woke up to the sound of a knocking at my door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeae
STRING: It seemed that I had fallen asleep when I was lying
about on my bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec4
STRING: [Chris] “...I'm coming!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: [Torta] “Sorry I'm late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3c
STRING: I realized I had forgotten something on the way here,
and had to go back to school to get it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf52
STRING: [Chris] “...Hm? What time is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf68
STRING: I turned around and looked at the clock, which read
just after six o'clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf86
STRING: [Torta] “I think I'm about thirty minutes late, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb4
STRING: You were asleep, weren't you, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff6
STRING: [Phorni] “He was asleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: Phorni appeared suddenly, and called out from a
distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1034
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, isn't Torta coming in?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104a
STRING: She asked me about Torta, even though she knew I
couldn't answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1056
STRING: Ignoring her, I responded to Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1062
STRING: [Chris] “... Only for a little bit. It's your fault for being
late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1094
STRING: [Torta] “Uh-uh, that's the face of someone who was
asleep for a long time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c6
STRING: [Phorni] “He slept sooo long!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10dc
STRING: [Chris] “...That's got nothing to do with it. Anyway, let
me get ready, I'll be right back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1118
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, okay, not like I have a choice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112e
STRING: [Chris] “That's what I was going to say about you being
late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1160
STRING: [Torta] “If you'd been awake, we could have already left
by now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1176
STRING: [Chris] “...Whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a8
STRING: [Torta] “Aha-ha!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d4
STRING: I left Torta at the entrance to my apartment, and went
into my room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fc
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you two only having dinner? Torta's not
coming by later?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121c
STRING: [Chris] “I told you, only dinner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1232
STRING: I patted down my messy bed-hair, put on my jacket and
headed for the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1264
STRING: [Phorni] “Not fair, I haven't seen her in so long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127a
STRING: [Chris] “Time to head out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: Saying only this, we headed out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fc
STRING: [Torta] “I guess she has already finished working
tonight?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1312
STRING: [Chris] “I guess it is about that time of night, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1344
STRING: [Torta] “Oh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1372
STRING: That's kind of a shame.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137e
STRING: [Chris] “You wanted to meet her and talk?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x139c
STRING: [Torta] “Not exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e4
STRING: Chatting like this as we walked, we arrived at the
trattoria much sooner than I had expected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1416
STRING: [Torta] “It's quite close by, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I only found out about this place recently.
Through Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145e
STRING: [Torta] “...Oh really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1474
STRING: Thinking that just maybe, we might be able to see Fal,
we actually did run into her as she came out of the
trattoria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b8
STRING: [Fal] “Oh... Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ce
STRING: [Chris] “Hey. We decided to come by for something to
eat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ee
STRING: I moved over to the side, positioning myself where
Torta, who was standing behind me, could see Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1520
STRING: [Torta] “...Hello.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1552
STRING: [Fal] “Oh... Hello there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1568
STRING: At that moment, Fal took a few steps forward, as if she
was pushed from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159a
STRING: [Fal] “...Oof.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ce
STRING: [Asino] “What's the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e4
STRING: Unexpectedly, it was Asino who came out from behind
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f0
STRING: [Chris] “Asino's here too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1622
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I'm sorry. I ran into Asino just now, in the
trattoria.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x165e
STRING: [Asino] “...Oh, it's you. You're here for a bite?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1674
STRING: [Chris] “That's right. With Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b0
STRING: [Torta] “Hello.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ec
STRING: [Asino] “...Hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170a
STRING: [Fal] “But, didn't you say you weren't coming tonight?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1720
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't plan to, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1754
STRING: [Torta] “We came because I said I wanted to come
here, that's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I see.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b4
STRING: I just finished my shift, so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e6
STRING: [Torta] “Ah, that's okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17fc
STRING: [Chris] “You're going home right? That's too bad. The
two of us will just grab something, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1838
STRING: [Fal] “Fair enough. I'm going to head home now, enjoy
your meal. Come again sometime too, Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188a
STRING: [Asino] “Huh...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b8
STRING: Okay. See you around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c4
STRING: [Chris] “Bye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18da
STRING: Torta simply gave a polite bow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e6
STRING: Stopping Fal on her way home and making her have
dinner with Torta and me wasn't really an option.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18fc
STRING: Asino had already eaten and was on his way out, so I
guess Torta and I would just have dinner together as
planned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1912
STRING: [Chris] “Well Asino, we're going to grab something to
eat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193a
STRING: [Asino] “Hm? Oh, right, see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195e
STRING: Asino gave an absentminded response, looking like he
wanted to get going.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1974
STRING: We exchanged pleasantries and watched Asino head
off home, and then Torta and I went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19da
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm. It's pretty nice in here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f0
STRING: Torta's first impression of the trattoria was unexpectedly
good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fc
STRING: But after that, for some reason she barely spoke, and
even during our meal the conversation was minimal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a12
STRING: Of course, when she ate the lasagne that Fal
recommended, she was very impressed and said it was
delicious, but even after that the atmosphere was
awkward as we left the trattoria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a82
STRING: [Chris] “...Is something the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab4
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae2
STRING: Uh, it's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aee
STRING: [Chris] “You know, we're already at that point where
you can't say that it's nothing. I could feel something
was strange the whole time. You didn't like the
trattoria?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b20
STRING: [Torta] “No, that's not it!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4e
STRING: It's just... There was something bothering me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b64
STRING: [Chris] “Something bothering you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b96
STRING: [Torta] “...Something that has no connection to you,
Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc4
STRING: Sorry, we don't eat out together so much and I ruined it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bda
STRING: [Chris] “I don't really mind, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0c
STRING: [Torta] “That's just how it is. Don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c22
STRING: [Chris] “...Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c38
STRING: I didn't quite feel satisfied with this, but Torta was
already smiling in the usual way that she did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4e
STRING: I decided not to pursue the topic, as I had the feeling
she wasn't going to answer any more questions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c64
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, I think I'll get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c82
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, me too. I'll see you tomorrow...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb0
STRING: Ah, but I guess we can't, can we.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cde
STRING: See you around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cea
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... See you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d34
STRING: It hurt a little when Torta said that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d40
STRING: But even so, the things we spoke about today were
important.
